title: Royal Enfield sales grow 18% to 73,136 units in April
description: Domestic sales grew 28 per cent to 68,881 units from 53,852 units in the year-ago month, the company said in a statement. Exports, however, declined by 49 per cent last month to 4,255 units compared to 8,303 months in April 2022.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
